___tags.description: A list of Tags for searching
___tags.title: Tags schema.

___gtin.description: A Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) is the 14 digit GS1 Identification Key used to identify products. The key comprises a GS1 Company Prefix followed by an Item Reference Number and a Check Digit. See http://www.gs1.org/gtin for more details.
___gtin.title: GTIN

___netWeight.description: Used to identify the net weight of the product. Net Weight excludes all packaging material, including the packaging material of all lower-level GTINs. Example:11.5 kgm.
___netWeight.title: Net Weight

___consumerHandlingStorage.description: Link to a website, file, or image containing the manufacturer's recommendations for how the consumer or end user should store and handle the product.
___consumerHandlingStorage.title: Has Consumer Handling Storage

___productMarketingMessage.description: Marketing message associated with the product. Consumer-friendly marketing detailed description of the product.
___productMarketingMessage.title: Product Marketing Message

___supplierSpecifiedMinimumConsumerStora.description: Represents the number of days between a product's sell by date and its use by date.
___supplierSpecifiedMinimumConsumerStora.title: Supplier Specified Minimum Consumer Storage Days

___consumerUsageInstructions.description: Free text containing the usage instructions of a product, which are normally held on the label or accompanying the product. This information may or may not be labelled on the pack.
___consumerUsageInstructions.title: Consumer Usage Instructions

___growingMethod.description: The process through which fresh produce is grown and cultivated.
___growingMethod.title: Growing Method

___includedAccessories.description: Any included object or device not part of the core product itself but which adds to its functionality or use.
___includedAccessories.title: Included Accessories

___descriptiveSize.description: An alphanumeric size factor the brand owner wishes to communicate to the consumer. IE Jumbo, Capri, Full Length, Maxi.
___descriptiveSize.title: Descriptive Size

___manufacturingPlant.description: A physical location consisting of one or more buildings with facilities for manufacturing.
___manufacturingPlant.title: Has Manufacturing Plant

___nutritionalClaim.description: Code indicating a nutritional claim applicable to the product, for example FAT_FREE.
___nutritionalClaim.title: Nutritional Claim Code

___gpcCategoryCode.description: 8-digit code (GPC Brick Value) specifying a product category according to the GS1 Global Product Classification (GPC) standard. For more information see http://www.gs1.org/gpc
___gpcCategoryCode.title: GPC Category Code

___servingSuggestion.description: Free text field for serving suggestion.
___servingSuggestion.title: Serving Suggestion

___warningCopyDescription.description: Warning information is additional information that outlines special requirements, warning and caution information printed on the package.
___warningCopyDescription.title: Warning Copy Description

___countryOfOriginStatement.description: A description of the geographic area the item may have originated from or has been processed.
___countryOfOriginStatement.title: Country Of Origin Statement

___manufacturersWarranty.description: The warranty associated with the product.
___manufacturersWarranty.title: Has Manufacturer's Warranty

___inPackageDiameter.description: The measurement of the diameter of the product in its package at its largest point. For example, 165 MMT.
___inPackageDiameter.title: In Package Diameter

___sugarsPerNutrientBasis.description: Sugars per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___sugarsPerNutrientBasis.title: Sugars Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___dietTypeDescription.description: Free text for indication of diet not stated in the list of diets.
___dietTypeDescription.title: Diet Type Description

___energyFromFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Energy from Fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___energyFromFatPerNutrientBasis.title: Energy from Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___additionalProductClassification.description: Relates to a set of additional product classification details
___additionalProductClassification.title: Has Additional Product Classification

___additive.description: Relates to details about any additives that a product may contain.
___additive.title: Has Additive

___allergenSpecificationName.description: Free text field containing the name and version of the regulation or standard that defines the criteria of allergen containment.
___allergenSpecificationName.title: Allergen Specification Name

___isDecaffeinated.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether or not the product contains caffeine.
___isDecaffeinated.title: Is Decaffeinated

___vintner.description: The person hired by a winery or wine company who is responsible for many of the processes in the preparation, taste and quality of the wine produced. The science of wine making is referred to as oenology. The vintner is the oenologist.
___vintner.title: Vintner

___manufacturer.description: The organization that produces the item.
___manufacturer.title: Has Manufacturer

___nutritionalClaimStatement.description: Free text field for any additional nutritional claims.
___nutritionalClaimStatement.title: Nutritional Claim Statement

___image.description: Link to a file containing a visual representation of the product.
___image.title: Has Product Image

___netContent.description: The quantity of the product contained by a package, usually as claimed on the label. Indicates the net content of the total product. For fixed value products use the value claimed on the package, to avoid variable fill rate issue that arises with some product which are sold by volume or weight, and whose actual content may vary slightly from batch to batch.
___netContent.title: Net Content

___provenanceStatement.description: Free text description of the region or place the product originates from. This is to be specifically used to specify areas such as cities, mountain ranges, regions. Examples: Made in the Thuringen Mountains, Made in Paris, From the Napa Valley.
___provenanceStatement.title: Provenance Statement

___iodinePerNutrientBasis.description: Iodine per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___iodinePerNutrientBasis.title: Iodine Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___packagingMarkedLabelAccreditation.description: A marking that the product received recognition, endorsement, certification by following guidelines by the label issuing agency. This does not represent claims for regulatory purposes on products such as free from markings.
___packagingMarkedLabelAccreditation.title: Accreditation Code

___preparationInformation.description: Links to information about how to prepare a specific Food/Beverage/Tobacco product.
___preparationInformation.title: Has Food And Beverage Preparation Information

___folicAcidPerNutrientBasis.description: Folic Acid per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___folicAcidPerNutrientBasis.title: Folic Acid Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___manganesePerNutrientBasis.description: Manganese per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___manganesePerNutrientBasis.title: Manganese Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___regulatedProductName.description: The prescribed, regulated or generic product name or denomination that describes the true nature of the product. For example for a food product in order to distinguish it from other foods according to country specific regulations.
___regulatedProductName.title: Regulated Product Name

___pantothenicAcidPerNutrientBasis.description: Pantothenic Acid per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___pantothenicAcidPerNutrientBasis.title: Pantothenic Acid Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___percentageOfAlcoholByVolume.description: The percentage of alcohol contained in product.
___percentageOfAlcoholByVolume.title: Percentage of Alcohol Per Volume

___transFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Trans Fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___transFatPerNutrientBasis.title: Trans Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___allergenSpecificationAgency.description: The agency or other organization that defines or manages the criteria for allergen containment.
___allergenSpecificationAgency.title: Allergen Specification Agency

___colourDescription.description: A description of the colour of an object.
___colourDescription.title: Colour Description

___dietCode.description: Links to multiple pairs of gs1:DietTypeCode and diet type sub code (free-form text string).
___dietCode.title: Diet Code

___outOfPackageDiameter.description: The measurement of the diameter of the product out of its package at its largest point. For example, 165 MMT.
___outOfPackageDiameter.title: Out of Package Diameter

___consumerStorageInstructions.description: Expresses in text the consumer storage instructions of a product which are normally held on the label or accompanying the product. This information may or may not be labelled on the pack.
___consumerStorageInstructions.title: Consumer Storage Instructions

___allergenStatement.description: Textual description of the presence or absence of allergens as governed by local rules and regulations, specified as one string.
___allergenStatement.title: Allergen Statement

___sodiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Sodium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___sodiumPerNutrientBasis.title: Sodium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___nutrientBasisQuantity.description: Quantity on which the nutrient information has been based; for example, per 100 grams. When specified, nutrientBasisQuantity establishes the basis for all contained nutrient records.
___nutrientBasisQuantity.title: Nutrient Basis Quantity

___isSliced.description: Determines whether the product comes pre-sliced.
___isSliced.title: Is Sliced

___preservationTechnique.description: Code indicating the preservation technique used to preserve the product from deterioration, for example, BRINING.
___preservationTechnique.title: Preservation Technique

___instructionsForUse.description: Link to a file containing the Instructions For Use.
___instructionsForUse.title: Has Instructions For Use

___functionalName.description: Describes use of the product or service by the consumer. Should help clarify the product classification associated with the GTIN.
___functionalName.title: Functional Name

___potassiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Potassium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___potassiumPerNutrientBasis.title: Potassium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___awardPrize.description: An award or prize given to the product.
___awardPrize.title: Has Award Prize

___fatPerNutrientBasis.description: Fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___fatPerNutrientBasis.title: Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___polyunsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Polyunsaturated fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___polyunsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.title: Polyunsaturated Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___cholesterolPerNutrientBasis.description: Cholesterol per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___cholesterolPerNutrientBasis.title: Cholesterol Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___ironPerNutrientBasis.description: Iron per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___ironPerNutrientBasis.title: Iron Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___referencedFile.description: Link to a file or website containing additional information on product.
___referencedFile.title: Has Referenced File

___brandOwner.description: The brand owner of the product. The organization that is responsible for allocating the GTIN to the product.
___brandOwner.title: Has Brand Owner

___consumerSalesCondition.description: A code indicating restrictions imposed on the product regarding how it can be sold to the consumer for example Prescription Required.
___consumerSalesCondition.title: Consumer Sales Condition Code

___consumerSafetyInformation.description: Information on consumer safety regarding the product.
___consumerSafetyInformation.title: Consumer Safety Information

___juiceContentPercent.description: The fruit juice content of the product expressed as a percentage.
___juiceContentPercent.title: Juice Content Percent

___inPackageDepth.description: The depth of the product in its packaging, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See http://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
___inPackageDepth.title: In Package Depth

___saturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Saturated fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___saturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.title: Saturated Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___saltPerNutrientBasis.description: Salt per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___saltPerNutrientBasis.title: Salt Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___reheatingClaim.description: Indicates, with reference to the product branding, labelling or packaging whether a food product which is ready to eat can be reheated if required prior to consumption.
___reheatingClaim.title: Reheating Claim

___energyPerNutrientBasis.description: Energy Per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___energyPerNutrientBasis.title: Energy Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___consumerPackageDisclaimer.description: Additional information that should be used in advertising and in displaying.
___consumerPackageDisclaimer.title: Consumer Package Disclaimer

___isVintage.description: Identifies whether the product makes claim to being vintage.
___isVintage.title: Is Vintage

___magnesiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Magnesium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___magnesiumPerNutrientBasis.title: Magnesium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___geneticallyModifiedDeclaration.description: A statement of the presence or absence of genetically modified protein or DNA.
___geneticallyModifiedDeclaration.title: Genetically Modified Declaration Code

___calciumPerNutrientBasis.description: Calcium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___calciumPerNutrientBasis.title: Calcium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___inPackageWidth.description: The width of the product in the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See http://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
___inPackageWidth.title: In Package Width

___productFeatureBenefit.description: Element for consumer facing marketing content to describe the key features or benefits of the style suitable for display purposes.
___productFeatureBenefit.title: Product Feature Benefit

___healthClaimDescription.description: A description of health claims according to regulations of the target market.
___healthClaimDescription.title: Health Claim

___seleniumPerNutrientBasis.description: Selenium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___seleniumPerNutrientBasis.title: Selenium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___vitaminDPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin D per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminDPerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin D Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___phosphorusPerNutrientBasis.description: Phosphorus per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___phosphorusPerNutrientBasis.title: Phosphorus Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___vitaminAPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin A per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminAPerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin A Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___outOfPackageHeight.description: The height of the product out of the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See http://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
___outOfPackageHeight.title: Out of Package Height

___fluoridePerNutrientBasis.description: Fluoride per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___fluoridePerNutrientBasis.title: Fluoride Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___countryOfAssembly.description: The place where product is assembled.
___countryOfAssembly.title: Has Country Of Assembly

___servingSizeDescription.description: A free text field specifying the serving size for which the nutrient information has been stated for example: per 1/3 cup (42 g).
___servingSizeDescription.title: Serving Size Description

___inPackageHeight.description: The height of the product in the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See http://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
___inPackageHeight.title: In Package Height

___drainedWeight.description: The weight of the product when drained of its liquid. For example 225 GRM, Jar of pickles in vinegar.
___drainedWeight.title: Drained Weight

___customerSupportCentre.description: The organization which provides product support to the trading partner organization to which merchandise is sold.
___customerSupportCentre.title: Has Customer Support Centre

___countryOfOrigin.description: Code indicating the country of origin of the product.
___countryOfOrigin.title: Has Country Of Origin

___copperPerNutrientBasis.description: Copper per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___copperPerNutrientBasis.title: Copper Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___servingSize.description: Measurement value specifying the serving size in which the information per nutrient has been stated. Example: Per 100 GRM.
___servingSize.title: Serving Size

___nutrientMeasurementPrecision.description: The Code indicating whether the specified nutrient content is exact or approximate.
___nutrientMeasurementPrecision.title: Nutrient Measurement Precision

___ingredient.description: Links to information about ingredients of a specific Food/Beverage/Tobacco product.
___ingredient.title: Has Food And Beverage Ingredient Information

___vitaminCPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin C per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminCPerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin C Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___packaging.description: Details on the packaging for a product including type, weight and materials.
___packaging.title: Has Packaging

___riboflavinPerNutrientBasis.description: Riboflavin per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___riboflavinPerNutrientBasis.title: Riboflavin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___isInstant.description: Determines whether the product is instant.
___isInstant.title: Is Instant

___productFormDescription.description: The physical form or shape of the product. Used, for example, in pharmaceutical industry to indicate the formulation of the product. Defines the form the product takes and is distinct from the form of the packaging.
___productFormDescription.title: Product Form Description

___numberOfServingsRangeDescription.description: A free text field specifying a range for the number of servings contained in the package.
___numberOfServingsRangeDescription.title: Number of Servings Range Description

___biotinPerNutrientBasis.description: Biotin Acid per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___biotinPerNutrientBasis.title: Biotin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___foodBeverageTargetUse.description: The type of meal the food or beverage product is targeted to for example Breakfast.
___foodBeverageTargetUse.title: Food Beverage Target Use

___sourceAnimal.description: Code indicating the source of raw material used to produce the food product, for example a GOAT for milk.
___sourceAnimal.title: Source Animal Code

___monounsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Monounsaturated fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___monounsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.title: Monounsaturated Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___zincPerNutrientBasis.description: Zinc per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___zincPerNutrientBasis.title: Zinc Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___packagingMarkedFreeFrom.description: Indication of the food ingredients that the package is marked free from.
___packagingMarkedFreeFrom.title: Packaging Marked Free From Code

___productRange.description: A name, used by a Brand Owner, that span multiple consumer categories or uses. E.g. (Waist Watchers).
___productRange.title: Product Range

___gpcCategoryDescription.description: A description of the code specifying a product category according to the GS1 Global Product Classification (GPC) standard.
___gpcCategoryDescription.title: GPC Category Description

___primaryAlternateProduct.description: A product that is similar to the current product but is not exact match. Same form fit function, e.g. same product different colour, different package size, better quality.
___primaryAlternateProduct.title: Has Primary Alternate Product

___outOfPackageWidth.description: The width of the product out of the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See http://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
___outOfPackageWidth.title: Out of Package Width

___organicClaim.description: Relates to an organic claim about the product
___organicClaim.title: Has Organic Claim

___packagingMarkedDietAllergenType.description: Indication of which dietary or allergen marks are on the package.
___packagingMarkedDietAllergenType.title: Packaging Marked Diet Allergen Type Code

___chromiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Chromium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___chromiumPerNutrientBasis.title: Chromium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___nutrientBasisQuantityType.description: The type of quantity specified in the nutrientBasisQuantity for example measurement, serving size, or container. This is used in conjunction with the nutrientBasisQuantity.
___nutrientBasisQuantityType.title: Nutrient Basis Quantity Type Code

___polyolsPerNutrientBasis.description: Polyols per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___polyolsPerNutrientBasis.title: Polyols Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___ingredientStatement.description: Information on the constituent ingredient make up of the product specified as one string.
___ingredientStatement.title: Ingredient Statement

___proteinPerNutrientBasis.description: Protein per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___proteinPerNutrientBasis.title: Protein Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___chloridePerNutrientBasis.description: Chloride per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___chloridePerNutrientBasis.title: Chloride Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___ingredientOfConcern.description: Indicates a claim to an ingredient, considered to be a concern for regulatory or other reasons, and which is 'contained' within the product but may not need to specify the amount whether approximate, or an accurate measurement be given.
___ingredientOfConcern.title: Ingredient of Concern

___niacinPerNutrientBasis.description: Niacin per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___niacinPerNutrientBasis.title: Niacin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___vitaminKPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin K per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminKPerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin K Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___colourCode.description: Relates to a set of details about the colour code for a product
___colourCode.title: Has Colour Code

___starchPerNutrientBasis.description: Starch per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___starchPerNutrientBasis.title: Starch Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurement.description: Code indicating whether the number of servings per package is exact or approximate.
___numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurement.title: Number of Servings Per Package Measurement Precision

___replacedProduct.description: Indicates the product identification of an item that is being permanently replaced by this product.
___replacedProduct.title: Has Replaced Product

___isProductRecalled.description: An indicator for the product to determine if the Manufacturer or Supplier has recalled the product.
___isProductRecalled.title: Is Product Recalled

___beverageVintage.description: The year in which the majority of ingredients are harvested and/or the alcoholic beverage is produced. Determination as to whether the vintage year is the harvest date or production date is according to requirements in the Target Market.
___beverageVintage.title: Beverage Vintage

___vitaminB6PerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin B6 per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminB6PerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin B6 Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___thiaminPerNutrientBasis.description: Thiamin per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___thiaminPerNutrientBasis.title: Thiamin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___outOfPackageDepth.description: The depth of the product out of its packaging, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See http://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
___outOfPackageDepth.title: Out of Package Depth

___vitaminEPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin E per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminEPerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin E Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___countryOfLastProcessing.description: The place where the product or ingredient was last processed and tested before importation.
___countryOfLastProcessing.title: Has Country Of Last Processing

___numberOfServingsPerPackage.description: The total number of servings contained in the package.
___numberOfServingsPerPackage.title: Number of Servings Per Package

___recipeWebsite.description: Link to a website containing recipes associated with the product.
___recipeWebsite.title: Has Recipe Website

___molybdenumPerNutrientBasis.description: Molybdenum per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___molybdenumPerNutrientBasis.title: Molybdenum Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___replacedByProduct.description: The product which permanently replaces the current product. This product is sent in the record for the original item that is being replaced.
___replacedByProduct.title: Has Replaced By Product

___carbohydratesPerNutrientBasis.description: Carbohydrates per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___carbohydratesPerNutrientBasis.title: Carbohydrates Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___additionalProductDescription.description: Additional variants necessary to communicate to the industry to help define the product. Multiple variants can be established for each GTIN for e.g. Style, Colour, and Fragrance .
___additionalProductDescription.title: Additional Product Description

___certification.description: Information on certification to which the product complies.
___certification.title: Has Certification

___productionVariantDescription.description: Free text assigned by the manufacturer to describe the production variant. Examples are: package series X, package series Y.
___productionVariantDescription.title: Production Variant Description

___alcoholicBeverageSubregion.description: A legally defined geographical region where the grapes for a wine were grown also known as an appellation. It is recommended to populate this property with an ISO 3166-2 code to indicate country and subdivision.
___alcoholicBeverageSubregion.title: Alcoholic Beverage Sub-region

___audioFile.description: Link to a file containing an audio clip which is relevant to the product. Examples are commercials, or instructional/ how to use audio files.
___audioFile.title: Has Audio File

___isCarbonated.description: Used to identify whether or not a beverage product is naturally effervescent or has been made effervescent by the addition of carbon dioxide gas.
___isCarbonated.title: Is Carbonated

___vitaminB12PerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin B12 per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___vitaminB12PerNutrientBasis.title: Vitamin B12 Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___productID.description: Additional means to the Global Trade Item Number to identify a product.
___productID.title: Product ID

___isFromConcentrate.description: Used to identify whether or not the product claims to be made from a concentrated formulation.
___isFromConcentrate.title: Is From Concentrate

___equivalentProduct.description: A product which can be substituted for the product based on supplier-defined functional equivalence to the product.
___equivalentProduct.title: Has Equivalent Product

___targetMarket.description: Relates to a set of target market details (product release date and associated countries)
___targetMarket.title: Has Target Market

___sizeCode.description: Links a product to one or more groupings of gs1:SizeCodeDetails representing the size value from a specified code list.
___sizeCode.title: Size Code

___foodBeverageRefrigerationClaim.description: Identifies whether or not the product requires refrigeration.
___foodBeverageRefrigerationClaim.title: Food Beverage Refrigeration Claim

___irradiatedCode.description: Indicates if radiation has been applied to the product.
___irradiatedCode.title: Irradiated Code

___variantDescription.description: Free text field used to identify the variant of the product. Variants are the distinguishing characteristics that differentiate products with the same brand and size including such things as the particular flavour, fragrance, taste.
___variantDescription.title: Variant Description

___dependentProprietaryProduct.description: Dependent products are products which are required to make the current product functional.
___dependentProprietaryProduct.title: Has Dependent Proprietary Product

___grossWeight.description: Used to identify the gross weight of the product. The gross weight includes all packaging materials of the product. At pallet level the productGrossWeight includes the weight of the pallet itself. For example, 200 GRM, value - total pounds, total grams, etc.
___grossWeight.title: Gross Weight

___fibrePerNutrientBasis.description: Fibre per specified nutrient basis quantity.
___fibrePerNutrientBasis.title: Fibre Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

___url.description: A Vaild Url (this is a simple one, there are more complex axamples but good for now)
___url.title: URL

___brand.description: The brand of the product that appears on the consumer package.
___brand.title: brand
